content:
Should you ever feel the need to purchase  pounds of beer Austin Beerworks has got you covered PERIOD

Packing  cans of their Peacemaker Anytime Ale into one unwieldy sevenfootlong cardboard case the craft beer maker from Texas will definitely turn some heads PERIOD Especially priced at only  PERIOD

Sadly youll have to drive to Austin to pick up a case and have a longbed truck to even think about transporting the goods back to Stillwater but its got to be worth the trip for the bragging rights PERIOD

And with that much beer all at once its sure to bring the entire world to the table in peace talks PERIOD

Find more information about the brew atanytimeale.com PERIOD
